title: Homeopathy - Revitalize Health And Wellness
description: Homeopathy is using energetic medicines to stimulate the body's own ability to heal itself. Remedies obtained from plants, metals, minerals and organic sources.
cleaned_text: Homeopathy Promote Self-Healing What is Constitutional Homeopathy? Homeopathy involves using energetic medicines to stimulate the body's own ability to heal itself. Homeopathic remedies are pure medicinal agents obtained from plants, metals, minerals and other natural organic sources. This makes them a great option for children, pregnancy and any acute or chronic disease.
